byline.original: By MICHAEL WINERIP and MICHAEL SCHWIRTZ
byline.contributor: Benjamin Weiser and William K. Rashbaum contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: The corrections officers, who worked in Fishkill, were accused of severely injuring Kevin Moore, tearing out his dreadlocks and lying about the encounter.

headline.print_headline: Prison Guards Are Charged in ’13 Beating of an Inmate
headline.main: Five New York Prison Guards Charged in ’13 Beating of Inmate

snippet: The corrections officers, who worked in Fishkill, were accused of severely injuring Kevin Moore, tearing out his dreadlocks and lying about the encounter....
abstract: Federal prosecutors unseal charges against corrections officers George Santiago Jr, Carson Morris, Kathy Scott, Donald Cosman and Andrew Lowery for 2013 beating of prisoner Kevin Moore at Downstate Correctional Facility in Fishkill, NY; claim officers faked injuries to justify attack and falsified reports.
